name: Choctris
overview: It's time to move away from the platform genre and look towards classic puzzle games for our retro fun, as if you loved the 1984 game of Tetris , you'll be pleased to know that as of today you can download the very latest Tetris clone of 'Choctris'. Yes indeed thanks to Saberman letting us know, he has told us if you head on over to the ppa.pl forums, Phibrizzo with Leon has released a new version of their Tetris clone which was originally teased as a beta version at the RetroKomp 2018 competition. Choctris is a clone of one of the most popular games of all time; a tile-matching, block rotating puzzle video game first released in 1984 which became a huge hit on the Gameboy in 1989. This version of the original Gameboy classic with its block switching and turning antics maybe not to everyone's like of genre, but this new version includes sfx effects and music using a mod player by Frank Willy, tracks from OST from the anime "Akira" and any other changes or additions mentioned at the link below.
